どこに進む？:
Where will we be
proceeding to?
えー？らしんばん、まわすのー？: Huh?... Are you gonna spin it?...
大型飛行艇による\n航空偵察を実施します。:
Conducting aerial reconnaissance
by flying boat.
航空偵察予定地点に到着しましたが、\n稼働偵察機がないため、偵察を中止します。:
We have arrived at the planned aerial
reconnaissance point, but there is no
operational reconnaissance aircraft.
敵影を見ず。\n本作戦完遂失敗。:
No enemy in sight.
We failed to complete this operation.
艦隊の針路を選択できます。\n提督、どちらの針路をとられますか？:
You can decide on the fleet's course.
Admiral, which heading should we take?
波静かな、泊地に適した海域です。:
The waves are quiet.
The area is suitable for an anchorage.
輸送物資の揚陸地点に到達しました。\n同地点付近の敵艦隊を捜索、これを撃滅せよ！:
The landing point of the convoy has been
reached. Search for and destroy the
enemy fleet in the vicinity of this area.
輸送物資の揚陸地点に到達しました。\n本海域の輸送作戦は無事完了しています。:
The landing point of the convoy has been
reached. The transport operation here has
already been completed successfully.
輸送物資の揚陸地点に到達しました。\n物資の揚陸を開始します。:
The landing point of the convoy has been
reached. Starting the landing of supplies.
